title: The Justin Lee Collins Show
overview: Award-winning comedy presenter Justin Lee Collins presents his very own entertainment show. Joined by a host of top celebrity guests, each week JLC sets out to bring joy to the masses via his very own comedic chat show.There is everything you would expect from the lovable Bristolian comedian; big studio set pieces, amusing VT items, cheeky hidden camera stunts, live music and audience surprises, but the theme always remains the same. It's all about "the good times!".
